name: ButSoccer
description:
ButSoccer is an online soccer game where the player enters a game controlling only his own player.

Call your friends, join a public server 24h or create your own and play a football match with everyone online, each controlling your character.

The Game is always updating to new versions and adding new features, come and play.

Note: We are looking for people who want to create a local community (country or continent) for the game, who want to organize federations, championships etc. If anyone is interested, contact us on twitter. (@StudiosAquarium)
